The salesman was very courteous, knowledgeable, and not pushy at all. He showed us pieces as per our likings and demands. In fact we ended up visiting the same store twice as we forgot to buy a piece for someone. So we made another trip and met the same salesman on the next day. We bought three women‚Äôs Kurtis and one men‚Äôs Kurta. Would definitely recommend to anyone who would like to buy genuine stuff at a reasonable price without sacrificing their patience and comfort.
